name: package-sign-client
description: Sign NuGet Packages using the SignServer
author: Dan Siegel

inputs.name: signClientUser
inputs.label: Sign Client User
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user account for the Sign Client such as `domainuser@contoso.com`. This can be a Build variable such as `$(SignClientUser)`.

inputs.name: signClientPassword
inputs.label: Sign Client Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user password for the Sign Client such as `mySecurePassword`. This can be a Build variable such as `$(SignClientPassword)`.

inputs.name: appSettingsType
inputs.label: AppSettings.json Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether to use a file from the source repository, or an Inline value in the Build.

inputs.name: appSettingsFilePath
inputs.label: App Settings File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the appsettings.json for the [SignClient](https://github.com/onovotny/SignService#client-configuration)

inputs.name: fileListType
inputs.label: Filter File Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies whether to use a file from the source repository, or an Inline value in the Build.

inputs.name: fileListFilePath
inputs.label: Filter File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the filter file such as `filelist.txt`. See more information on the [SignClient](https://github.com/onovotny/SignService#client-configuration)

inputs.name: fileList
inputs.label: File Filters
inputs.helpMarkDown: filelist.txt content. May contain multiple patterns, one per line, with wildcards. See more on the [SignClient](https://github.com/onovotny/SignService#client-configuration)
